'''La vaguelette''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the single ''[[La vaguelette feat. Ayanga (Album)|La vaguelette feat. Ayanga]]''. The vocals were performed by {{W|Ayanga}}. The music video was released on November 12, 2023, and the single containing this song was released on streaming platforms on November 15, 2023.

The song is a French cover of the original version of ''[[La vaguelette]]'' sung by Cécilia Cara, composed by Dimeng Yuan of [[HOYO-MiX]], written by Hani ({{zh|哈尼}}), Hsiang Liu ({{zh|项柳}}), and Bao ({{zh|三宝}}).
